meanings.sent1: The jumbo shrimp dish was oxymoronic because the shrimp were both large and small.
meanings.sent2: The concept of a deafening silence is oxymoronic.
meanings.sent3: It was oxymoronic to see the tiny elephant in the circus.
meanings.sent4: Her bittersweet smile was oxymoronic, conveying both joy and sadness.
meanings.sent5: The icy hot sensation of the muscle rub was truly oxymoronic.
